brand.name: Elite Local Lawns
brand.tagline: You can tell by the way I mow.
brand.objection_handle: The Zero-Debris Guarantee: I bag and haul it all away.

hero.headline: Warminster’s Premium Small-Lot Specialist
hero.subtext: Professional lawn care for 1/4 acre lots. I don't just mow; I leave your property spotless.

features.title: Precision Mowing
features.description: Tailored for 1/4 acre lots using pro-grade equipment.

features.title: Bagging & Hauling
features.description: I take the grass clippings with me—no messy clumps left behind.

features.title: Detail Finishing
features.description: Full trimming and sidewalk blowing included with every visit.

processSteps.title: Site Review
processSteps.description: I meet you at your property to walk the lawn and discuss your needs.

processSteps.title: Trailer-to-Turf
processSteps.description: I arrive with specialized equipment, ready to transform your yard.

processSteps.title: The Clean Sweep
processSteps.description: After mowing, I blow the walkways and haul away all debris.

faqs.question: Do you leave the grass bags on the curb?
faqs.answer: No. I take all clippings and small branches with me in my trailer.
